item.question:
accustom
[əˈkʌstəm]
item.answer:
【考法】vt.使习惯：to make familiar with something through use or experience
【例】As a kid from Southern California, the first challenge in his PhD life is to accustom himself to the harsh winter climate in Boston. 身为来自南加州的小孩，他博士生涯的第一道挑战就是习惯波士顿寒冷的冬天。|| If you are accustomed to timeseries analysis, you can develop new and more delicate quantitative models. 如果你对时间序列分析有所了解，你就能构建出更新、更精妙的定量模型。
【近】familiarize, habituate, inure, orient, wont
【反】alienate, estrange, wean 使疏远
